name: Not Cross - 1 vs 1
description:
Not Cross 1 vs 1 is a fun and easy math-puzzle game!

▸ 10 dots - 20 lines
▸ 15 dots - 35 lines
▸ 20 dots - 50 lines
▸ 25 dots - 65 lines
▸ 30 dots - 80 lines
▸ 35 dots - 90 lines
▸ 40 dots - 100 lines

• You shall be presented with entangled lines which are connecting various points.
• The objective of the game is to move the points around and place them in such a way that none of the lines cross each other.
• Each time you play the game, you shall be given a unique puzzle to solve. This presents you with a new challenge each time you play the game.
• Tangled Line is a simple yet mind bending puzzle game.

Hope you like our new puzzle game, more game please follow us https://www.tumblr.com/blog/azhuona
